entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
